text: Im having a lot of trouble with the JS caching when developing modules ATM. Has been fine for the last two weeks, but now It wont update the JS on refresh. Even with the cache disabled in browser etc.
Cache isnt in the browser. HubSpot caches the pages on their server. You can load without caching by adding any query parameter to the URL ?blahblah
You do have to change the parameter every time you load the page

Hi there! A client of mine is looking to pass the HubSpot Contact ID as a query parameter to the url we provided at the end of lead form i.e. <https://app.tryflowspace.com/app?hsid=1234515>

I'm not sure if this would work in real time as HubSpot would likely need a few seconds to generate a new contact ID first but maybe it's possible! I work in marketing ops, not dev, so I'm adding <@U04AGAF1CGL>, VP of engineering at my client's company, to provide more context if needed!

Can anyone provide guidance on what can be considered a unique ID in HubSpot post form submission where we have a thank you that can be passed into our URL so we can distinguish which traffic came from which form submission?
